title: Superhero Kids Are Saving the Earth

content.en: The Earth needs a lot of help. Who can help? One man says kids can help the Earth!
content.tw: 有個人說小朋友可以幫助地球!

content.en: The man made a game for kids. The game helps them save the Earth! In this game, kids are superheroes.
content.tw: 他為小朋友設計了一個救地球的遊戲，在遊戲裡，他們都是超級英雄。

content.en: How do kids play the game? First, they make a superhero group. Superheroes are stronger together.
content.tw: 這個遊戲該怎麼玩呢? 首先小朋友們要組成超級英雄聯盟。

content.en: Then they look at their neighborhood. Can they help the Earth there? Are the parks dirty? Are there no trees or gardens?
content.tw: 他們找找看家裡附近有沒有可以幫助地球的，公園乾不乾淨，是不是沒有樹或花園。

content.en: The superheroes talk to people in their neighborhood. They learn a lot. Some people give them more help.
content.tw: 超級英雄和鄰居聊過，他們學到很多，有一些鄰居還給他們很多幫助。

content.en: The superheroes have many ideas. They make a plan and then … the superheroes have fun!
content.tw: 孩子們有很多的想法。他們訂了一個計劃。

content.en: The superheroes make parks clean and green! They plant trees! They make neighborhood gardens! They have fun together and help save the Earth!
content.tw: 孩子們綠化了公園，也把它變乾淨! 他們玩得很開心還幫助了地球!

content.en: The Earth needs many superheroes. You and your friends can be superheroes too! Play the game together.
content.tw: 地球需要很多超級英雄。你和你的朋友也可以成為超級英雄！一起玩這個遊戲吧。

vocabulary.preface: 一個好玩的遊戲，讓兒童幫地球的忙。

content.text:
1. dirty 髒的。
Wow, this beach is really dirty! 哇，這個海灘真是髒!
Yeah… It was not like this when I was little. 是啊，我小時候不是這樣的。

2. look at 看，注視。
Look at all these bottles and bags! 你看這些瓶子袋子。
Should we help clean this beach? 我們應該幫忙清理這個海灘嗎?

3. neighborhood 鄰近的區域。
No! What we should do is get everyone in this neighborhood to help out.
不，我們應該做的，是讓這個地方每個人都來幫忙清理。
That's too hard. 那太難了。

4. together 一起。
I know. But it's the only way. 我知道，不過這是唯一的辦法。
And it can be fun when people do it together. 而且大家一起做，還會很好玩呢!

vocabulary.postscript:
一起來讀今天的單字。
dirty髒的 look at注視 neighborhood鄰近的區域 together一起
